scripts.package: npx electron-packager . --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=twemoji-14.0-chart-increasing.icns --overwrite && electron-installer-dmg ./"Desmos Desktop-darwin-x64/Desmos Desktop.app" desmos-desktop-x64
scripts.package-arm: npx electron-packager . --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --icon=twemoji-14.0-chart-increasing.icns --overwrite && electron-installer-dmg ./"Desmos Desktop-darwin-arm64/Desmos Desktop.app" desmos-desktop-arm64
